title: Spirit Box
desc:
Post 1426
- Everyone draws a card.
- On your next turn, everyone draws a card.
- On your next next turn, everyone discards a card.
- On your next next next turn, everyone either discards or draws a card.
- On your next next next next turn, everyone draws 30 cards.
- On your next next next next next turn, everyone discards 32 cards.
- On your next next next next next next turn, everyone else draws a card.
- After I wrote this, next doesn't look like a word anymore.
